Wod.title: Wod
Wod.description: Represents a Workout of the Day (WOD) in CrossFit.

id.description: Unique identifier for the WOD entity.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this WOD.

name.description: Name or title of the WOD.

description.description: Detailed description of the WOD, including exercises, sets, and reps.

type.description: Type of WOD (e.g., AMRAP, For Time, EMOM).

imageUrl.description: Data URI of the image of the whiteboard WOD.

imageHint.description: A one or two-word hint for finding a relevant stock photo.

date.description: Date when the WOD was created, in yyyy-MM-dd format.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the application, including their subscription status and usage quotas.

uid.description: The unique user ID from Firebase Authentication.

premium.description: True if the user has an active premium subscription.

ocrCount.description: The number of OCR scans performed this month.

ocrReset.description: The timestamp when the ocrCount will reset.

dailyReactions.description: The number of reactions made today.

dailyReset.description: The timestamp when the dailyReactions count will reset.

favoriteWods.description: An array of WOD IDs that the user has favorited.

wodGenerationCount.description: The number of WODs generated today.

wodGenerationReset.description: The timestamp when the wodGenerationCount will reset.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single chat message in a community WOD chat.

text.description: The content of the chat message.

userId.description: The UID of the user who sent the message.

userDisplayName.description: The display name of the user who sent the message.

timestamp.description: The server timestamp when the message was created.

definition.description: Stores user-specific data like subscription status and quotas.
Stores WODs created by a specific user. Access is restricted to the owner (user identified by userId).
Stores chat messages for a specific community WOD. Messages are publicly readable.
